short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Passage simplification tool for better content comprehension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our chrome extension with the implemention of the Artificial General Inteligence helps users to improve their content comprehension by summarizing, paraphrasing and translating content.

Brainiac is also useful for individuals who create blog posts or articles, as it allows them to quickly process the key points of their text and identify the key parts of their writing while improving the language used to enhance user comprehension.
